description: Summary of files included in a download order.

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this order.

createdOn.description: The date-time when the order was created.

zipFileName.description: The name of the file containing this order.

totalSizeBytes.description: The total size of all files in this order in bytes (uncompressed).

totalNumberOfFiles.description: The total number of files in this download order.
